ac: 33, touch 19, flat-footed 26 (+9 armor, +2 deflection, +6 Dex, +1 dodge, +5 natural)
special_attacks: favored enemy (animals +2, dragons +4, giants +4, magical beasts +4)
other_gear: +3 mithral breastplate, +1 elven curve blade, +2 composite  longbow (+2 Str) with 60 arrows, belt of incredible dexterity +4, boots of elvenkind, cloak of resistance +3, efficient quiver, ring of feather falling, ring of protection +2, 1,380 gp

spells.ranger spells prepared:
(CL 14th; concentration +15)

3rd-darkvision, neutralize poison

2nd-barkskin, bear's endurance, protection from energy, snare

1st-delay poison, hide from animals, longstrider, pass without trace, resist energy

feats: Critical Focus, Deadly Aim, Dodge, Endurance, Improved Critical (composite longbow), Manyshot, Mobility, Point-Blank Shot, Power Attack, Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Shot on the Run, Spring Attack, Tiring Critical

sections.body:
Before Combat The ranger casts barkskin, bear's endurance, darkvision, delay poison, longstrider, and pass without trace.

During Combat The ranger prefers ranged combat. He uses Deadly Aim with Rapid Shot, hoping to also use Tiring Critical.

Base Statistics Without barkskin, bear's endurance, darkvision, delay poison, and longstrider, the ranger's statistics are

Senses low-light vision

AC 28, touch 19, flat-footed 21

hp 108

Fort +13

Immune sleep

Speed 30 ft.

Con 11

Skills Acrobatics +23.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The daredevil hunter seeks the largest and most dangerouscreatures for trophy kills.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Ranger/Rangers/Daredevil Hunter/Thalion Skytale

sections.body: Thalion thinks of himself as the world's greatest big game hunter. He spends days—even weeks—tracking creatures he intends to slay, and sometimes hires his services to areas plagued by marauding giants or dragons. If he mistakenly attacks an animal companion or eidolon, he apologizes and asks to duel the creature to test his skills.

sections.name: Thalion Skytale

special_qualities: camouflage, elven magic, favored terrain (forest +2, mountain +4, plains +4), hide in plain sight, hunter's bond (companions), quarry, swift tracker, track +8, weapon familiarity, wild empathy +17, woodland stride
name: Daredevil Hunter
skills: Acrobatics +23 (+27 when jumping), Climb +9, Handle Animal +8, Knowledge (arcana, local) +10, Knowledge (nature) +13, Perception +21, Ride +11, Stealth +26, Survival +21, Swim +5
combat_gear: +1 dragon-bane arrows (5), +1 giant-bane arrows (5), +1 magical beast-bane arrows (5); potions of displacement (2), potions of fly (2), potions of haste (2), scroll of commune with nature, wand of cure moderate wounds (20 charges)
